CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Post_Code__c)),HYPERLINK("https://www.google.com/maps/?q="+Post_Code__c,IMAGE('https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center='+Post_Code__c+'&zoom=15&scale=false&size=400x400&maptype=roadmap&format=png&visual_refresh=true&markers=size:mid%7Ccolor:0xff3643%7Clabel:%7C'+Post_Code__c, 'Location')),"A postcode needs to be entered for the location in order to view the map")
CustomField.label: Map
